products.title: Advanced Hud System
products.description: Modern aesthetics, extensive player customization options, and top-tier optimization - these are the essentials your server needs to stand out in the FiveM community. Our latest HUD script is a perfect blend of style, functionality, and performance, designed to enhance the gaming experience for both ESX and QBCore servers.
products.fullDescription: Modern aesthetics, extensive player customization options, and top-tier optimization - these are the essentials your server needs to stand out in the FiveM community. Our latest HUD script is a perfect blend of style, functionality, and performance, designed to enhance the gaming experience for both ESX and QBCore servers.
products.installation:
1. Download and extract  
2. Add to resources folder 
3. ensure resource in server.cfg
 4. Copy `qb-core/17mov_functions.lua` file from `installation` folder. 
5. Paste copied file to root directory of your `qb-core` resource. 
6. Open `qb-core/fxmanifest.lua` and add this line at bottom of manifest file  `client_script `17mov_functions.lua` ` 
7. Restart your server

products.title: Hot Dog Job
products.fullDescription: This is an Modern advance Hot Dog Job
products.installation:
1. Download and extract  
2. open config.lua change your framework 
3. open file qbcore shared item.txt 
4. copy paste into [qb] /qb-core/shared/item.lua 
 5. download picture icon paste into qb-inventory/html/image/ 
 6. ensure resource in server.cfg

products.title: Advanced Fishing Job
products.fullDescription: This is an Modern fishing Job
products.installation:
1. Download and extract 
2. ensure resource in server.cfg 
3. Open Inventory_Items/InventoryImages & Copy all Image paste 
in qb-inventory 
4. Open Inventory_Items/QBCore/items.lua & paste all code 
in qb-core/shared/items.lua 
5. Open Inventory_Items/QBCore/ox_inventory.lua & paste all code 
in ox_inventory/data/items.lua

products.title: Advanced Rental System
products.fullDescription: This is an Modern Rental System
products.installation:
1. Download and extract 
2. ensure resource in server.cfg 
3. open janiel-rentals/web/images and copy image rentalpapers.png  paste to your qb-inventory/html/images/ 
4. Open Shared/items.lua & copy all code paste 
in qb-core/shared/items.lua

products.title: Advanced Shop System
products.fullDescription: This is an Modern Shop System
products.installation:
1. Download and extract 
2. ensure resource in server.cfg 
3. open config/main.lua change ImagePath 
 ESX: nui://ox_inventory/web/images/ 
 QB: nui://qb-inventory/html/images/

products.title: Advanced Wash Money System

2. ensure resource in server.cfg

in qb-core/shared/items.lua

products.title: Advanced Drugs System

products.installation:
1. Download and extract 
2. ensure resource in server.cfg 
3. open config.lua change framework 
4. open folder !Install / images and copy all images past into
 qb-inventory/html/images/ 
5. open file qbitem.lua in folder !Install then copy all code paste into
 qb-core/shared/item.lua
